entry.summary: RT turja.eth 🕺 Been an avid reader of http://avc.com by @fredwilson but always found it tough whenever I'm on the move or offline So I put together some scripts to let me download over 9000 blogs in PDF, CSV, MOBI and EPUB Dive in or download or contribute 🤠 https://github.com/tchowd/avc.com
